extendedInfo.description: The perfect app for Whippet owners, or indeed any dog lover. Whippets, famous as "racing dogs" are a wonderful breed, with short coats and svelte, sculpted figures. The images included in this app will look wonderful as a background on your device.Over 30 high-quality images are included in this app, and more will be added, keep checking for new ones.Please understand some ads will be displayed within our apps to help support continued development.

reviews.title: Waist of time
reviews.comment: Waist of time, this awful app is just useless and the photos are low quality, wouldn\'t even rate this at all
reviews.author: Samuel Turnbull
